title: Ticket #1047: Have debug output from DAGMan post script reaper
description: The PRE script reaper in DAGMan has a couple of places that print out the status of the PRE script when it finishes. It would be good if the POST script reaper also had similar printouts (although maybe not enabled at the default debug settings). Right now, the POST script reaper doesn't print anything (the only printing happens when the POST_SCRIPT_TERMINATED event is read). That makes it harder to figure out whether the reaper or the event reading code is the problem if something bad happens with POST scripts.
